name: MS Paint Paw Pals
description:
When Joey the cat decides to cook himself some fish, a thunder storm & an outing at the mall forces him to wrestle with his inability to communicate and the constant pressure to pleaSE OTHERS ALONG WITH THE NEVER ENDING DREAD OF NOT KNOWING IF THE PEOPLE YOU LOVE REALLY LOVE THE REAL YOU OR JUST THE IMAGE THEY HAVE OF YOU IN THEIR HEAD GOD OR SOMEONE ANYONE SHOW ME SOMETHING THAT I KNOW IS REAL AND TRUE PLEASE IM BEGGING YOU... Hilarity ensues. 

  • 15 min Visual Novel
  • Scrunkly MS Paint art
  • Small horror elements
  • Cute Soundtrack
  • Constant puns
  • Catnip
